SDG_GOAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: Target 3.3: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator is measured indirectly through the proportion of children 5 years of age who have developed chronic HBV infection (i.e. the proportion that tests positive for a marker of infection called hepatitis B surface antigen [HBsAg]).
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 3.3: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
